name: Dragon Fire Scale
description: Flex your scales, reducing damage taken from projectiles by 50% for 6 seconds.   When you are hit with a projectile, you retaliate by launching a fiery orb at the attacker that deals 1799 Flame Damage.  This effect can occur once every half second.
effectLines: Incoming projectiles cause you to deal Flame Damage back to the attacker.
coefDescription: Flex your scales, reducing damage taken from projectiles by 50% for 6 seconds.   When you are hit with a projectile, you retaliate by launching a fiery orb at the attacker that deals $1 Flame Damage.  This effect can occur once every half second.
rawDescription:
Flex your scales, reducing damage taken from projectiles by <<1>> for <<2>>. 

When you are hit with a projectile, you retaliate by launching a fiery orb at the attacker that deals <<3>>. This effect can occur once every half second.
